content: Hi - Would really like to talk to someone from the Argonaut project next week at the WGMregarding their Conformance statement (http://www.fhir.org/guides/argonaut/r2/Conformance-server.html). We are doing an English equivalent and would like to discuss what your approach was/is.
Eric and I will both be at the connectathon -- come say hello.
Unfortunately I will not arrive until late Saturday (i.e. not at the connectathon) are you there all week?
Thanks @Brett Marquard - I'll hunt you down :-)
